TestBackwardPlaybackDecoupledTimeDoesNotRewindAfterSourceStarts()

Tests that during backwards playback the decoupled clock always moves in the backwards direction after starting the source clock. For this test, the source clock is started when the decoupled time crosses the 1000ms-boundary.

[Test]
public void TestBackwardPlaybackDecoupledTimeDoesNotRewindAfterSourceStarts()

TestCoupledSeekedBySourceSeek()

Tests that the coupled clock is seeked when the source clock is seeked.

[Test]
public void TestCoupledSeekedBySourceSeek()

Tests that the coupled clock seeks to the correct position when the source clock starts.

Tests that seeking a decoupled clock negatively does not cause it to seek to the positive source time.

TestForwardPlaybackDecoupledTimeDoesNotRewindAfterSourceStarts()

Tests that during forward playback the decoupled clock always moves in the forwards direction after starting the source clock. For this test, the source clock is started when the decoupled time crosses the 0ms-boundary.

[Test]
public void TestForwardPlaybackDecoupledTimeDoesNotRewindAfterSourceStarts()
